subject: Product Question
description_text:
Hello,
I am looking to buy Simsonn pedals with the intention of upgrading them
with the VAM pro haptics later on. Does the control box that comes with the
Plus X pedals work with the VAM haptics? When I look to buy the Plus X
pedals on Amazon the description says that I need to buy another control
box for the haptics to work.

Thanks for your help

conversations.body_text: Hi Haveitall,  The control box is included with your pedal purchase; you don't need to buy a separate one. You can purchase it on the official website and use the $45 discount: Black45. https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-x-pedals
